channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Trees overhanging foot path and garden fence need crowning, 15th April
item.description:
There are a number of dead hanging branches over the back of my garden at 79 Weland Lodge Road which it a foot path between Welland lodge road and Broad Acre Road These appear to be low hanging and dead and could fall injuring people or causing damage to my fence

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Starvehall Farm Footpath, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: River Chelt pollution?, 15th April
item.description:
Noticed between 9am and 9:45 the river water has gone from clear to milky white. Maybe pollution upstream?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arle Avenue, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
